com.quinsoft.zeidon

Interface ZeidonLogger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.slf4j.Logger
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskLogger

    public interface ZeidonLogger
extends org.slf4j.Logger
    Extends SLF4J logger with some convenience methods.
